attributes.action: seek to address the abysmal performance of the England Football team and to ensure that the same people are not allowed to be involved in the appointment of a new manager.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The continuing gross mis-management by the  Football Association in the selection process and appointment of a national team manager has resulted in this proud nation being derided and the subject of global ridicule.
Such an important task requires professional recruitment procedures to avoid a repetition of the present scandal.  The financial losses alone will never be recovered and will contribute to the present down turn in economic recovery

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
